content:
The cost of developing an Uber-like application can vary greatly depending on the specific features and requirements of the client, the platform (iOS, Android, web), the number of developers involved, the duration of the project, and the country where the developers are based.

A rough estimate for the development of a basic version of the app for one platform (e.g. iOS or Android) with a team of 2-3 developers for 4-6 months could range from $30,000 to $100,000 or more.

It is recommended to have a detailed scope of work and requirements from the client to provide a more accurate cost estimate.
